Sub ()

'
Dim sia As Worksheet
Dim shtb As Worksheet
Dim lr As Long
Dim rng As Range


Set sia = ActiveWorkbook.Sheets("File_name")


lr = sia.Range("A" & Rows.Count).End(xlUp).Row
Set rng = sia.Range("A1:T" & lr)

cr = Cells(1, Columns.Count).End(xlToLeft).Column

Sheets.Add
pivotWS = ActiveSheet.Name

ActiveWorkbook.PivotCaches.Create(SourceType:=xlDatabase, SourceData:= _
"File_name!A1:T" & lr, _
Version:=6).CreatePivotTable TableDestination:=pivotWS & "!R3C1", _
TableName:="PivotTable1", _
DefaultVersion:=6



原意係想自動搵最右下角有資料既儲存格，然後全選做分析表
File_name!A1:T" & lr, Version:=6).
